The post Betsafe: 100% up to €50 welcome bonus with 20 Spins! appeared first on Magic Casino Online.
item.content:encoded:
This offer is available for New Customers registering from the 17th May 2018 and will expire after 30 days from registration. The deposit bonus offer (100% up to €50) is only available to New Customers making an Initial Deposit of €10 or more. The additional 20 Bonus Spins is only available to New Customers making an Initial Deposit of €25 or more. Customers depositing via the following are not eligible for the Casino Welcome Offer: Moneybookers, Skrill & Neteller.

1. Sign up with Betsafe

2. Make your first deposit

3. Active your 100% bonus & use Bonus Spins on ‘Coins of Egypt’

Only your first deposit will qualify for the Offer. The minimum deposit required to activate this offer is €10.

The deposit bonus is that of 100% up to €50.

The maximum total bonus amount permitted per player or account is €50.

In order to receive the Offer, you will be required to claim the Bonus whilst making the first deposit.

On claiming the Bonus, you will receive the amount specified in ‘Bonus Money’ and the equivalent amount from your deposit will be reserved as ‘Locked Money’.

The ‘Bonus Money’ and any winnings generated from them are reserved money and cannot be withdrawn until the Wagering Requirement of the Bonus is met.

Bonuses in Casino have got a max bet restriction in place of €6 per game round or €.0.50c bet per line (or currency equivalent) and failure to adhere to this max bet rule may result in account closure and forfeit of the Bonus and any winnings attained during the wagering of the Bonus.

Wagering Requirements of Welcome Bonus: Please note the bonus amount must be wagered a minimum of 40 times within 30 days before you can make a withdrawal. For example, if you claim a €25 Bonus, you will be required to bet a total amount of €1,000 (which is €25 x 40) in the casino.

Sign up with Betsafe

The post Betsafe: 100% up to €50 welcome bonus with 20 Spins! appeared first on Magic Casino Online.

The post Free Spins Party – Every day a is a celebration! appeared first on Magic Casino Online.
item.content:encoded:
Play your favourite slot and get up to 110 free spins each week! Getting free spins has never been this easy. All you need to do is wager €50 or more on any casino slot to get your free spins. You can get even more spins in the weekend! Every day a is a celebration!

1. Open Account
Click “Open Account” and fill in the registration form

2. Play
Wager a total of €50 or more on any casino game in the allotted time.

3. Free Spins
Get your spins on the free spin games of that day!

Players who are resident in the following countries are not eligible for this promotion: Afghanistan, Algeria, Angola, Austria, Australia, Bahrain, Belgium, China, Cuba, Czech Republic, Denmark, Eritrea, Estonia, Ethiopia, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Iceland, Indonesia, Jordan, Iran, Iraq, Ireland, Italy, Kuwait, Latvia, Libya, Lithuania, Malaysia, Malta, Mauritania, Mauritius, Morocco, Norfolk Island, Norway, N. Korea, Oman, Pakistan, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Rwanda, Saudi Arabia, Sudan, Somalia, South Sudan, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Syria, Turkey, Tunisia, UAE, United Kingdom, Yemen, United States and its dependencies, military bases and territories including but not limited to Am. Samoa, Guam, Marshall Islands, N. Mariana Islands, Puerto Rico, and Virgin Islands. Wrongfully obtained bonuses will be confiscated at our discretion. Any decision about a country not listed, is solely at the discretion of our Customer Service.

The promotion is available from 18:00 (CEST) on Monday 21 October until 23:59 (CEST) on Saturday 30 November.

To qualify for the free spins, players need to play €50 on any slots in the allotted time: €50 from Monday to Tuesday, €50 from Wednesday to Thursday and €50 from Friday to Sunday.

Players will receive a reward for each task after meeting the requirements for the given offer. All prizes will be paid out directly to the player’s account after completing the specified task.

There is only one prize per offer. For example: Play €50 Monday to Tuesday and get 30 free spins. If you complete the task and play €50 on both days, you will receive free spins only once.

Only real money wagering counts toward this promotion.

Free spins will be automatically added to the player’s account. Free spins can be used only in selected games given for a given period:
– Monday to Tuesday: 30 spins on Mercy of the Gods, Cash-O-Matic, Narcos, Arcane: Reel Chaos.
– Wednesday to Thursday: 30 spins on Go Bananas, Wild Worlds, Fruit Case, Golden Grimoire.
– Friday to Sunday: 50 spins on Turn Your Fortune, Vikings, Wild Bazaar, Coins of Egypt.
– Wednesday to Thursday Halloween (30 and 31 October): 30 spins on Halloween Jack, Witchcraft Academy, The Phantom’s Curse, Dracula.

Winnings from free spins are paid out as bonus money and must be wagered 35 times within 5 days.

Players have to open any of the five games to claim their free spins within 2 days of receiving them.

Failure to meet the wagering requirements will result in the forfeit of any winnings that have resulted from the free spins.

If a player excludes himself after winning a prize, Betsson will cancel the win.

General Terms and Conditions apply.

Open Account

The post Free Spins Party – Every day a is a celebration! appeared first on Magic Casino Online.
